channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: Mark Few won the Naismith Coach of the Year award, was he the clear cut favorite?
Was Mark Few trhe clear cut favorite to win the Naismith Coach of the Year award?
item.description: The College Basketball season after for the first time in NCAA history where the March Madness tournament was canceled. Teams suffered from losing the postseason play like the Dayton Flyers who seemed to be a possible one seed lead by former player Obi Toppin. This season was different. These teams wanted to continue the path they have laid out for them in the previous season. None of the basketball teams could do this without their head coach.

item.title: Who deserved the NCAA Coach of the year in the 2020-2021 College Basketball season?
item.description: The College Basketball season after for the first time in NCAA history where the March Madness tournament was canceled. Teams suffered from losing the postseason play like the Dayton Flyers who seemed to be a possible one seed lead by former player Obi Toppin. This season was different. These teams wanted to continue the path they have laid out for them in the previous season. None of the basketball teams could do this without their head coach.

item.title: Should Gonzaga move to a bigger conference after its performance in the 2020-2021 season?
item.description: library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.3 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.0.5 ✓ dplyr 1.0.3 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.2 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 1.4.0 ✓ forcats 0.5.1 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() threeconferences <- read_csv("~/Downloads/Gonzaga Project - Sheet1.csv") ## ## ── Column specification ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── ## cols( ## .

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Brandon Mueting. I am a sophomore at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln, I am majoring in broadcasting and sports media. Next year I plan on adding athletic coaching along with my business minor. I am a huge college basketball fan, being the biggest Creighton Bluejay fan out there!
